jakarta.nosql.mapping.document

Interface DocumentTemplate


  • public interface DocumentTemplate
    This interface that represents the common operation between an entity and DocumentCollectionEntity.
    See Also:
    DocumentCollectionManager

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Returns the number of elements from document collection

      Returns the number of elements from document collection

      Finds by Id.
      <T> Iterable<T> insert(Iterable<T> entities)
      Saves entity, by default it's just run for each saving using insert(Object), each NoSQL vendor might replace to a more appropriate one.
      <T> Iterable<T> insert(Iterable<T> entities, Duration ttl)
      Saves documents collection entity with time to live, by default it's just run for each saving using insert(Object, Duration), each NoSQL vendor might replace to a more appropriate one.

        <T> Iterable<T> insert(Iterable<T> entities)
        Saves entity, by default it's just run for each saving using insert(Object), each NoSQL vendor might replace to a more appropriate one.

        T - the instance type
        Parameters:
        entities - entities to be saved
        Returns:
        the entity saved
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when entities is null

      • insert

        <T> Iterable<T> insert(Iterable<T> entities,
                       Duration ttl)
        Saves documents collection entity with time to live, by default it's just run for each saving using insert(Object, Duration), each NoSQL vendor might replace to a more appropriate one.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the instance type
        Parameters:
        entities - entities to be saved
        ttl - time to live
        Returns:
        the entity saved
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when entities is null

      • singleResult

        <T> Optional<T> singleResult(String query)
        Executes a query then bring the result as a unique result
        Type Parameters:
        T - the entity type
        Parameters:
        query - the query
        Returns:
        the result as Optional
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when the query is null
        NonUniqueResultException - if returns more than one result

      • find

        <T,K> Optional<T> find(Class<T> entityClass,
                       K id)
        Finds by Id.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the entity class type
        K - the id type
        Parameters:
        entityClass - the entity class
        id - the id value
        Returns:
        the entity instance otherwise Optional.empty()
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when either the entityClass or id are null
        IdNotFoundException - when the entityClass does not have the Id annotation

      • delete

        <T,K> void delete(Class<T> entityClass,
                  K id)

        Type Parameters:

        K - the id type
        Parameters:
        entityClass - the entity class
        id - the id value
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when either the entityClass or id are null
        IdNotFoundException - when the entityClass does not have the Id annotation

      • count

        long count(String documentCollection)
        Returns the number of elements from document collection
        Parameters:
        documentCollection - the document collection
        Returns:
        the number of elements
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when document collection is null
        UnsupportedOperationException - when the database dot not have support

      • count

        <T> long count(Class<T> entityType)
        Returns the number of elements from document collection
        Type Parameters:
        T - entityType
        Parameters:
        entityType - the document collection
        Returns:
        the number of elements
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when document collection is null
        UnsupportedOperationException - when the database dot not have support

      • singleResult

        <T> Optional<T> singleResult(DocumentQuery query)
        Returns a single entity from query
        Type Parameters:
        T - the instance type
        Parameters:
        query - - query to figure out entities
        Returns:
        an entity on Optional or Optional.empty() when the result is not found.
        Throws:
        NonUniqueResultException - when the result has more than 1 entity
        NullPointerException - when query is null
